title: Backpack
summary: Helps users track every aspect of the trip in one place
fullDescription: This is my personal pet project, from mockup, to frontend, to backend. The app allows to input flight details, accommodations, activities, collaborate with friends, and save the itinerary to PDF. Currently it is in progress, roadmap can be found in README file.

summary: BE service for AquaTracker, app that helps to control daily water consumption
fullDescription: This application was implemented as a graduation group project in GoIT. It allows CRUD operations for User and Water entities. My parts: BE team leading, code review, app architecture, Swagger docs.

title: Wheels
fullDescription: A web-application for a car rental company, where user can check info about the available cars and contact the rental service. Was implemented as a personal project during studying in GoIT. Uses mockAPI service.

title: Money Guard
fullDescription: A financial dashboard for control of expenses and income. Was implemented as a team project in GoIT. My parts are: team leading, creating base app, code review, Redux store.

title: Nerium
fullDescription: A financial dashboard for easy control of expenses, income, and savings. Was implemented as a team project during the internship in ElifTech. Unfortunately, repos are private and production is no longer available. My parts are: admin access on BE, admin UI, app localization, creating desktop mockup in Figma.
